## verticesFnFactory() function

Helper function that returns a [VerticesFn](./composition-plot.verticesfn.md) for a set of predefined plot layouts.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function verticesFnFactory(plotType: PlotTypes, origin: Vec2, size: number, fontSize: number): VerticesFn;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  plotType | [PlotTypes](./composition-plot.plottypes.md) | The layout of the composition plot |
|  origin | Vec2 | The origin of the plot |
|  size | number | The length of the plot edge |
|  fontSize | number | The size of the vertex labels |

<b>Returns:</b>

[VerticesFn](./composition-plot.verticesfn.md)

A VerticesFn
